# PyBluez-bitalino

The PyBluez module allows Python code to access the host machine's Bluetooth
resources.

## Platform Support

|      Windows       |
| :----------------: |
| :heavy_check_mark: |

## Python Version Support

Python 3.7 +

## Installation

Please refer to the [installation instructions](/docs/install.rst).
